@jitendravyas @NetlifyCMS The CMS is not optimised for mobile use. However it is essentially a UI to ease management of content in git. I've often used it in conjunction with going directly to my site source in @GitHub and used their mobile UI to make changes (which @Netlify automatically deploy)
